divs: sighting detailsto whom it may concern, i want to know if anyone can recall or seen anything unusual in the night skies of march 1, 2007 aprox around 7:55pm\ 8pm. night was dark, and clear skies. i was in the back porch smoking a cigarette, and the porch faces north. what i seen can not be explain. and it did not have the movements or the usual blinking green and red lites seen on a conventional plane or helicopter. these were big circular light balls i drew a quick (child like picture) only to not forget the event with my computer basic paint shop program. here is the explanation of what i saw. # ! seen the yellowish\ orange circular lites in the triangular pattern. steady and not moving. # 2 seeing the same pattern, but now pulsating real bright, as if throwing sun rays. steady and not moving # 3 returns to normal (or # 1) steady and not moving # 4 triangle pattern disappear or turns into a ball of white lite # 5 white ball of lite pulses real bright white for a quick second. # 6 white ball (bottom right hand corner of sky) shoots upward and outward in the east\northeast direction. in another quick second. # 7 white ball of lite is much smaller now, reaches (upper left hand corner of sky) # 8 white ball pulses bright again # 9 returns to normal small white ball # 10 white ball disappeared, reappears are the yellowish\ orange circular lites in the triangular pattern. steady and not moving # 11 the yellowish\ orange circular lites in the triangular pattern pulse again, as if throwing sun rays. steady and not moving # 12 returns to its normal color and pattern steady and not moving # 13 disappear, as if someone turn off a light in a room. in explanation number six i live in the town of valaparaiso, indiana. it seem like the lite figure could have been possibly hovering (yellowish orange) over the town of portage or chesterton and\ or going in that direction (white ball of lite) this lite show, was about one minute or shy of a minute.
